testsuite.name: com.coffee.api.CoffeeAPITest

testcase.name: API should return 404 when an invalid name is send through a GET request()

testsuite.system-out:
***** REQUEST: GET: /roaster/covfefe ***** GET /roaster/covfefe HTTP/1.1
***** RESPONSE 404 to GET: /roaster/covfefe ***** HTTP/1.1 404 Route not found
